channel.title: Bootstrapped, Episode 75, "Don't you worry about Dave. You worry about Butov!"
channel.description:
In this episode we talk about Ian's trip to Laracon, politics, working on multiple projects simultaneously, working on web apps vs other types of products, The Hive, changes at Userscape, dogs, naps, contractors, Twitch, board games, and kids growing up.
[**Download this episode**.](http://bootstrapped.fm/bootstrapped-episode-75-dont-you-worry-about-dave-you-worry-about-butov/)
* [Fideloper (Chris Fidao) on Twitter](https://twitter.com/fideloper) * [Servers for Hackers](https://serversforhackers.com/)
[Thanks to Linode for sponsoring this episode. Sign up today and get $20 off.](https://linode.com/bootstrappedfm/?utm_source=bootstrapped&utm_medium=podcast&utm_content=20%20dollar&utm_campaign=bootstrapped2016)

item.title: Bootstrapped, Episode 75, "Don't you worry about Dave. You worry about Butov!"
item.dc:creator: rfctr
item.description:
Every episode feels too short, like there are a ton of stuff that you folks left uncovered. You gotta do something! Maybe double the episode length or do it 3 times a week?

Read full topic
item.source: Bootstrapped, Episode 75, "Don't you worry about Dave. You worry about Butov!"
